title: Union Park acquires GAM, launches precision motion control platform
description:
This acquisition marks the launch of Union Park’s new precision motion control platform, positioning the firm to capitalize on growth in industrial automation and robotics.

The post Union Park acquires GAM, launches precision motion control platform appeared first on The Robot Report.
